scripts.debug-electron: react-scripts build && cp -r platform/electron/electron.js ./electron.js && electron ./electron.js && rm electron.js && rm -r build
scripts.release-electron: react-scripts build && cp -r platform/electron/electron.js build && electron-builder --dir && rm -r build
scripts.release-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --minify true --entry-file platform/mobile/mobile.js --bundle-output movelet/main.jsbundle && react-native run-ios --configuration Release --no-packager
